about.title: Hi!, I'm Frontend Developer
about.description: I build practical systems that solve real operational problems. Focused on logistics, automation and scalable web applications.
about.moreDescription: I started my journey as a self-taught developer, learning through structured online resources and hands-on projects. Today, I focus on building scalable web applications that solve operational and business problems.

projects.intro: Here you'll find real-world systems and web applications built to improve workflows, optimize processes and deliver practical solutions.

contact.openTo: I'm open to opportunities where I can contribute to real-world systems, automation and business-driven applications

contactForm.title: Or send me a message
contactForm.name: Your name
contactForm.successMessage: I'll get back to you soon.

whatsapp.label: Contact via WhatsApp
whatsapp.message: Hi Ivan! I saw your portfolio and I'd like to get in touch.

pokeapi.description: In this project I reused a card that I had made in the Frontend Mentor challenges to give it interaction with the Pokemon API.

github.description: This is my GitHub account, where I often upload my projects. I invite you to follow me!
